content.detailedDescription: On january 28th our daughter reported seeing a cigar shaped object hovering over the treeline at her school, we reported it to mufon.  one week later on the same day, friday, our son saw the same object hovering over our house.  we also reported that sighting.  one week later, on saturday morning feb 9th our daughter woke up and saw the same ufo hovering outside the front of our house at approx 5 am.  she also noticed smoke coming from her floor and woke us up.  the front of our house was completely engulfed in flames.  we all escaped and were completely unharmed with the exception of one of our dogs.  the house was completely destroyed.  the ufo she saw was the same one she reported seeing at her school two weeks before.  it was cigar shaped and large, approx. the size of a two story house.  both our daughters description and our sons one week prior to the fire were the same.
content.summary: Our 11 year old daughter saw same ufo the morning our house burned down

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out of our front door, at the address listed above, around 6:30am.  was looking at the southern horizon seen the object described above slowly falling for about five seconds and then dissapeared behind the mesa.  the path was in an arc from east to west but became vertical as it went behind the mesa.  i can narrow down the path to a pretty small swath of sky as it was between two trees in the yard. when i first saw the object i was actually immediately taken back to having seen the exact same type object falling the exact same way in fairbanks alaska when i lived there.  and at that point i figured it was a rocket fired from poker flats testing range on a return path, but never heard anything more about it.  that event was around 1992-1996.  my reaction was like what the heck.  makes the hairs stand up on your neck.  in alaska i was actually facing 180 degrees away from the object when i got a chill down my spine that made me turn around.  this object only gave me a chill afterwards but i figured it was likely a meteorite or a satillite falling.

i immediately told my wife what happened.  after arriving at work she was told by a coworker, who lives on the mesa where we had seen the object disappear, that he had seen state police and military personel heading up to morisonia(sp) mesa and i guess there was about 200+ other reports of the incident.  he then told her about this website so i decided to submit a report as well.

i have pictures of my view point that i will have to upload at a later point if someone can send me a link.

feel free to contact if you need more information.
content.summary: Bright green sphere/orb glowing from inside out; like a flare.  no noise or smoke trail

content.detailedDescription: My wife reported this incident to me last night its pretty much the way she discribed it to me as in the short discription as above she was going to work at approx. 7:45 am looked in sky seen object looked away looked up it was gone looked again seen object again looked away because she driving looked again it was gone she would not have told me about if she didn't think it was unusual.She works till 5;00 pm if you would like her first hand account. if you have info satilite,baloon,etc. contact my email.
content.summary: Wife seen starlike object in eastern sky seen it disappear and reappear then disappear again

content.detailedDescription:
We saw brilliant balls of light two nights in a row.  the first night, we went to sit outside in the back yard on 9-9-10 at 8:35 pm after dark.  over the mountains to the east of us was a big ball of really bright light, i would almost call it a brilliant, not as big as venus but almost and certainly as bright.  we kept watching it as it slowly traveled south along the mountain ridge but we couldn't see any red or green or any flashing lights at all like would be normal for us to be able to see of a plane at that altitude.  it was not a helicopter because they don't fly at that height and there would be no reason for a plane to have it's landing lights on in that area plus [first name removed/cms/dr] thought it was moving slightly away from us and we only would have been able to see landing lights if it were facing us. i thought it was just traveling south along the mountains.  then it turned east, the brilliance faded within less than a second to completely disappear then a very faint, faint light, barely visible, going off east for another split second.  while the turn was not at a right angle, it very nearly was cuz it was big and bright then it went out, fading to nothing.  we are always able to hear planes, even at comtrail height and this had no sound whatsoever.   we see planes all the time at night and are always, always able to see their blinking lights.  this was much, much bigger than any plane and it was far brighter than any stars.  like i said, it was almost the size and definitely the brightness of venus. 

the next night (9-10-10), we went outside again at 9pm, laughing at ourselves for thinking we'd see another one.  well...We did.  first, we looked over to "our" mountain ridge hoping to see something.  there was nothing and we just laughed at ourselves.  so we are sitting there in our chairs, staring up at the sky, when i look up and here comes this bright light out of the west heading east.  i'm thinking it's got to be a satillite - it was very high but [first name removed/cms/dr] pointed out it wasn't high enough plus it was, again, extremely bright and really big, almost bigger and brighter than the other one the previous night.  [first name removed/cms/dr] says he thinks the one the night before was actually brighter than venus but just didn't have the star things poking out like venus does - it was just a glob of light like this one was too.  
 
well, we're watching this thing approach, fly right over us and we turned around to follow it's path.  as it got closer to the east, it suddenly went up! and completely faded off in a second.  we both saw a couple small, faint flashes but not plane light flashes as it changed from the level flight path to the straight up one.  we could not believe it!  we even burst out laughing like you do when something is so strange and so completely unlikely to happen to you.  
 
we were in a state of shock, not knowing quite what to think.  so about 1/2 hour later, we went out again, and this time, there were planes in the sky which we could easily see their white, red and green lights blinking even the one that was probably about 15k feet or better so the two things we have seen were not planes plus there was no comparison on size - the planes were like 100th the size as the light blobs.  the second one also made no a sound.  now we did see what was probably a regular satillite and they are much, much smaller and much higher.  either way, we are shocked.  we have noticed both sightings were when there were no planes in the sky at all.  either time.  we are on a flight path from points north - portland, seattle south to la or the bay area - and they usually follow the mountain ranges or i-5 with the flights on pretty much hourly schedules.  very interesting that this second one was coming from west to east at sort of a southerly heading cuz there are no flights coming from that way ever.  there is nothing in that direction but the pacific ocean.  my husband estimated the first light at about 10k feet and the second one at maybe 15k feet.  we live in a small town without interference from city lights so our view of the night sky is good.
content.summary: A large, brilliant ball of light - as bright as venus & far, far bigger than any plane

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the pennsylvania turnpike around 10:15pm just a few minutes away from the conshohocken exit when i noticed an unusual craft smoothly and quietly gliding across the sky from the front the front left of my car. it appeared to be either black or a very dark grey color and in the shape of an elongated diamond. the longer tips were pointing towards the front and rear of the craft. at the rear under belly of the craft were three large lights in the formation of a triangle and at the front tip of the craft were smaller lights that seemed scattered. the smaller lights were hard to make out from the angle and short amount of time i had to observe the object. i watched the craft gracefully fly across the turnpike in front of me and then head to the right and back of my car as i continued driving. one thing i noticed before i lost sight of the ufo was that the back right light ( one of the three in the triangle formation) was abruptly shut off, leaving only two lights at the rear. this was right before the craft appeared to descend in its flight and thats when i lost view ( and almost crashed my car) oh and all the lights appeared to be white in color. when i first noticed the craft i thought it must be some new type of military airplane or something but the odd triangular shape of the lights and the fact that none of them were blinking or red tipped me off that this was unusual. also i have never seen a flying object that had no wings or propellers, like i said, the shorter tips of the diamond shape were pointing to the sides. also it is hard to explain but the way it flew was eerie, smooth, graceful, seemingly silent and quick, the flying pattern had a slight curve to the right but mostly it just headed straight on. i pulled out my cellphone to take a pic but didn't get much of a shot, instead of fiddling with my phone to try again i decided to abort the effort and just stare at it for as long as possible, i would have pulled over if it were safe but there were plenty of cars on the road zipping around me ( i had slowed down and drove a bit recklessly) i would be very surprised if none of the other cars on the road noticed this peculiar flying object. i can't really explain how i felt, part of me was excited but i wasn't scared ( which is how i always thought i would feel if i saw a ufo) i know it was definitely a ufo but i'm not so sure it was extraterrestrial. i have never seen any craft look or fly the way this one did but at the same time something felt "human" i mean it was so obvious and didn't look like it was trying to be stealth at all... anyway thats it, the craft  looked like it was flying lower and lower and was lost behind a bunch of trees and the hills to the right of my car. i got to my exit and stared at the sky for the rest of the drive home hoping to catch another glimpse.
content.summary: Dark elongated diamond shaped craft with 3large lights (triangle formation) at the rear, smoothly floats across pennsylvania turnpike

content.detailedDescription: Walking to the store off along research blvd (10710 research blvd, @ about 8:30 pm.  i looked up and saw an orange sphere crossing the sky and then watched as either four or five more came into view, creating the effect of a string of pearls, only they looked like basketballs.  i do live in an area where there are military bases not to distant from austin, tx.  my overall reaction was curiosity wondering if they could be flairs?  i continued on the store.
content.summary: Orange spheres

content.detailedDescription: I waiting to report this, but i saw this tonight. i was waiting to see if anyone else reported something like this first because i wasn't quite sure what i was looking at. but i see someone in austin made a report. im about 4 hours away from austin but i too saw a pulsating orb going from ne to sw. it just went slowly across the sky till out of view, wasn't a plane or helicopter. just a fairly large pulsating orb, was white in color, wasn't a satellite. i have no clue what it was.
content.summary: Pulsating orb

content.detailedDescription: At aprx 10:15pm i looked up at the stars and noticed a very slow moving orb of light that pulsed every 3 to 5 seconds very slow, i noticed a plane flying by the object and the object pulsed bright white and when it faded it jumpd over and was now further to my right, this hapend very quikly, then the oject turned into a redish color pulse but only once and then instantly dissaperd
content.summary: Slow pulsing white orb that turned red and disapered

content.detailedDescription: i was taking my dog out to pee. and i whitnessed a very large ship that looked as if it was dark with matter? is the only way i could describe the ship.I mean this thing was soo big that i was thrusted to the ground on awe. it was so big that the only thing that was in the area that was smaller than this would be a football field that was in the area nearby..I tried to get pictures and just ended up getting just the lights on the ship. but...Keep in mind,i had no prevous knolege of ufo's except for the awakening...Is what i call it.I actually felt someone observing me:: that i have dicumented and video plus pictures proof that aliens are real and i have a picture of ufo that came down to meet me and that is when i got this video. a clear picture of an alien inside ship and looking at me..I figured that i was able to get the ufo on video is because they wanted me to see them..Letting me know that they are here..I have no photomat programs on my computer and no way to manipulate photo's.The only capabilities my computer has is to down load pictures and avi.That is all..Anyone that has had experiances like i have all my life wouldn't or couldn't or just like me just don't have the means for it. i just wanted to let the world know that we aren't alone and i have the proof at a buddy's home for safe keeping. i have already gotten my computer upgraded and just as i started posting the ufo pictures online..I guess the government wants to keep this secret? too bad...Secret is out>>and spreading rappidly !!!When  obama decides to come and talk..? then i can show him personally that e.B.E's  are real and want someting big and it could start in our slavery all over again?Anbody worried?Yet!!!
content.summary: I looked up from a few minutes and as i was aware that my dog was acting wierd.(anctous), iooked up and spotted the huge disk arive, so i watched it..

content.detailedDescription: The witness, on monday, sept. 20, 2010, was driving to work (he is a truck driver) on rte. 95 north, just outside of new haven. he had to be at work at 6 am. he was going by long wharf, approaching the cue bridge on rte. 95, when he viewed a light to the ne --  a bright, almond-shaped light, with a little bubble-like attachment to the lower point. he estimated that it was approx. ��� mile from the bridge, est. 2-3000 feet in altitude, and was approx. 100 feet across. it was between the defunct power plant and a 120 ft high white wind turbine. it was not blinking; it was approx. over the grand st. area of fairhaven (witness during phone interview consulted a rand mcnally map of new haven to estimate this location), a city adjacent to new haven. he viewed this several times as he was driving, then he started to look for an area to pull over and watch the object. he parked to the side of the highway, but then the object was no longer visible.
content.summary: Almond shaped light

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my buddy were sitting down outside our dorm, and as an astronomy major i'm always looking at the stars. this time when i look up i see a bright orange light hovering in the sky. it was around the same color of a street light, so i asked my friend if it was a streetlamp or something else. he confirmed that it was not a streetlamp and told me that it must have just appeared since it was not there earlier.  the light began to dim making the shape of the craft visible, me and my friend both confirmed that it was indeed cigar-shaped. after that the light began to gradually get bright again, then shrink into darkness. this time after the light dimmed completely, the craft flew around for about a minute then began to emit a white light which flashed towards the edges, mimicking a commercial aircraft. that's when i noticed another strange light higher in the sky that was not a star; this one emitted a deep blue light and was stationary.
as first craft continued to circle the area, me and my buddy got a text from our friend saying he was about to get into a fight, so we left and ran to his aid. i tried to take a picture on my blackberry, but both lights looked like nothing more than tiny white dots.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two ufos near sdsu

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend was coming from my anunts house which is in the hills of ky where there mountain that all arounds us we look up and seen a blue light with yellow and orange around in crossing the sky with a tie of light behind it then it went from one side of the mountain to the other side we got scared and took off and ever seen it again.
content.summary: I like to know what i seen in the sky over ky

content.detailedDescription:
These two pictures showed 7 invisible ufo light balls arranged in a straight line formation. one was captured on year 2007, with a shutter speed of 1/800 of a second. one on 27 sept 2010 with a shutter speed of 1/1000 of a second. looks like those ufo light balls are not less than 30 cm in diameter. 
this case is one of my long term  ufo & alien���s  visitation, more details from: *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).
content.summary: 7 ufo light balls arranged in line formation

content.detailedDescription: Star gazing in my back yard kettering oh 8:44 pm motion caught my eye,the object i seen was very very fast crossing the sky in 6 or 7 seconds,from the north to the south,it seemed to be whitish grey in color,it was tumbling end over end and in total silence.This thing was in the sky not in space,its hard to gauge the elavation,10 to 20 thousand feet? its size was big, the speed and rotation was shocking to me, ive looked up for years and seen nothing but regular orbiting craft,meteors,ect. 200 meters by 75 meters is the best i can do about size estamation,the shape was hourglass form but the middle was not small like an hourglass it was almost as wide as the ends,it seemed 1 dimensional i.E almost flat, its rotation was steady its track linear,i still have goosebumps,wow. the thing i seen was real,i will take a polygragh. thank you,  c.W.S.
content.summary: I was sky watching in my back yard looking at cass,from the north came a hourglass shaped tumbling thing

content.detailedDescription:
Outside at approx 10pm.  i noticed the object to the direct north-west of my home.  this would put it directly over the beach just sounth of the coquille river mouth and jetty.  the object moved laterally in several directions.  the object displayed red white and blue alternating flashing lights.  there was also a cluster of brilliant white lights on the underside(ground side) of the object.  it would remain motionless for 5 minutes or so and then veer off either to the north or the east.  returning after a few mintues.  there was no sound.  the sky was clear at the objects altitude but the was a layer of light fog below below the object to the ground.  we took several digital pictures and i tried my night vision scope for a better look.  the nvg image was washed out by the brilliance of the white light.  i could make out no further details as far as shape thru the nvg.  overall, i estimate the altitude as not more than 1,000 feet, and the object appeared to have more of a diamond shape than anything else.  at times, all of the lights would blink out, returning a few seconds later.
my final impression was that it may have been a kite, but i could see no one along the shoreline or on the bluff above the beach through the nvg.  there was no way i could determine the object's size since i lacked any visual reference to it.  it was, from my location, located about 335 degrees, at an angle of about 40 to 45 degrees above the horizon.  there was no moon, or any other bright objects in the sky.  we are far from any large airport, and are outside of the normal flight paths of anything.  meaning, we rarely see aircraft in the skies here wth the exeption of small private planes.

i will attach the photos this evening when i get home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Chevron,   Cross,   Diamond,   Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: A slowly moving diamond shaped object with colored and brilliant white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My area obeys 3 ufo hot spot criteria:

1- the site is considered sacred or hallowed and is frequently marked with ancient monuments: king snefru`s red pyramid and bent pyramid are visible due to contours from where i live, they are about 150-200 km away to the south west, also the mountain supposedly the stones of the great pyramid were quarried from to the north, there is a cemetery to the east
2- there`s an energy field in the area: there is a concentration of high voltage power lines to the east
3- there`s always a military presence nearby: yes there is, very near


i was standing by the balcony to enjoy late night fresh air, full moon and observe the night sky till my tea water boiled, my eyes were directed towards the objects since my first step into the balcony, i noticed those attractive lights in the sky on the east
i thought those could be meteorites coming in, when i had a closer look i noticed no tails, no incoming motion sign and the changing color flashing lights 
those objects seemed apparently to be stationery then faded away from the visible dimensions to higher invisible dimensions
i was so delighted to witness a visitation from wise, peaceful and super intelligent beings, to be honest, i noticed my music production after that sighting took a different turn, many helpful ideas in many things just pop up into my mind instantly as i think of starting to think about the matter itself, also my determination and desire to work more rose more than it was before
i lost sight of the objects as they transcended to higher invisible dimensions, that lead me to the conclusion they could be higher dimensions crafts
i have no access to a radar to verify the sighting and i didn`t report that to the authorities here, mufon are the right people to report to
content.summary: Just like a gig in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Between 8:45-9:00 roughly, i was riding in the car with a girlfriend of mine.  we were heading east on stassney from 35. i saw to my right, over the city, a bright light that appeared to be floating. it was brighter than any plane i'd ever seen. i pointed out to my friend who was driving and could only catch glimpses of it as per trees, but noticed immediately that it was too far away to shine as brightly any typical aircraft. i considered shortly that it may be a helicopter with a spotlight, but it was a very well balanced light source that shone like a prism, not a spotlight. we pulled into a left turn lane and stared at it, where we watched for about one minute. i was only able to take one photo from this point, my camera would not cooperate. we turned, pulled the car over and quickly jumped out. the aircraft hovered for another two minutes or so while we repeated our bewilderment to each other in the street. "what is that? no way", "that's a ufo, this is incredible", over and over. i snapped two more photos. my camera was responding slowly and i gave up on taking photos to pay better attention to the aircraft, but the two photos were taken when it dimmed it's light to a red shade and moved toward us. more graceful than any helicopter. this is when i gave up taking photos and watched. it passed above us heading southeast. it was very dark in color when we saw the underside of it. like that of a stealth aircraft. it was almost rectangular in shape with one corner leading the way. it passed silently over us, speeding up as it passed and sending a few faint pulses of light. i don't know what to think, but i've encountered people in this town that i've felt absolutely zero human connection with. i don't know what to think about that. i've seen mysterious lights in the sky before but never anything like this, and i had a close friend by my side that saw it all. bizarre. i'm a 22 year old white female from florida, living in austin just over a year. let me know if this occurrence rings any bells.
content.summary: Bright white light that dimmed to red and passed silently over.

content.detailedDescription:
(disclaimer: i���ve been very interested in this subject for a few years and check the mufon sightings often, but have not previously had a sighting and wasn't thinking about it when this took place. i wouldn���t have noticed these objects at all except for a bizarre incident that happened first, so i���ve described that as well.)

yesterday was a beautiful sunny sunday morning with a clear blue sky. i was out walking southward around 10:00 a.M. on a fort collins street, warming up for a run when something very strange caught my eye. about 40-50 feet above a house across the street to the west was a gigantic group of large birds, moving circularly in a tight funnel, wider at the top and narrower below. this house has been under renovation the last few weeks, so my first impression was that they possibly were buzzards that had found something upturned from the construction. 

the pattern of their circulation and thermal-riding was somewhat like the vultures-above-man-in-desert clich���, but i dismissed that notion as unlikely to occur above this urban house, and there were far too many of them. there were at least 40 birds, maybe even 50 or 60. moreover, it appeared to be not a homogeneous flock of crows or other single species but a mixed group with variable sizes. this included a number of large birds that were clearly raptors, with big wingspans and brown feathers. any one of those would be noteworthy in this area, but very odd in that quantity and nearness to each other. i realized this loose ���bird tornado��� was actually slowly moving eastward and not staying above the house where i first noted them. as the still-circling formation started to pass over the street toward me, small numbers of birds peeled off and flew over my head eastward. 

it was while looking up at these smaller bunches of birds flying overhead that i saw two clear pinpoint lights above and beyond them to the south. one was white, and the other was red or very slightly pinkish-red. the white one was brighter and steady. the red one initially fluctuated a little in brightness but wasn���t blinking. as they moved farther away, the red one appeared steady also.

i stopped looking at the bird funnel still passing over me and tried to figure out what those lights were. they were moving, but very slowly. they were not planes or helicopters. there was no sound except low ambient city noise (the birds were silent also). they had the clear bright quality of light-emitting sources, unlike reflected light off a balloon. if it weren���t the middle of a bright sunny day, they might have passed as stars. i���d say when i first saw them they were at about a 50��� angle from my vantage point, at a very rough guess 400-800 feet up. they were initially close enough to overhead that i automatically associated them with the birds��� strange behavior, although nothing logical warrants that. 

from that point on, i barely paid attention to the birds as they travelled eastward, although the last time i glanced, the funnel was breaking up about a block to the east. the two lights were slowing moving south and upward. their positions relative to one another changed, but the distance between the two objects didn���t. first the red light was to the upper right, then moved to lower right and possibly behind, then back to the upper right. 

relative to my position they eventually dropped slightly in the sky (40��� or so) and shrank as they moved southward, but stayed more or less in the same spot in the sky as they diminished because of increasing altitude. i tracked them into the brilliance of the blue sky for about five minutes; they were faintly visible to an extremely long distance away.

there is the possibility that these were flares of some kind lofted by balloons, but i have several problems with that theory. although the distance was tricky to judge, initially i think they were close enough that i should have seen something supporting them, and there was nothing. they also would have to be linked together somehow to maintain that consistent distance. there would have to be a substantial and consistent linear north wind at their altitude to move them, but yesterday was a very still day, at least on the ground.

as i said, i can���t help but link them with the birds��� anomalous behavior, although i have nothing logical to justify that other than their proximity.
content.summary: Slow-moving daylight white and red stars

content.detailedDescription: Was trying to locate jupiter when i noticed a bright reddish object traveling from west to east. it was low and as large or larger then a big plane flying at a lower elevation. when i first saw it, it gave me an impression that a plane was on fire. all i could see was a bright red light in front of the craft shaped like a sphere as if it was a giant red head light. it had a ora around it with some yellowish orange color around the sides. i ran in the house and got my wife, mother in law and daughter and they came out and saw it. it was moving at a slow speed when it appeared to slow to a stop and reverse direction now traveling east to west. as it moved west it started to get smaller and smaller as if was moving upward until it was a small dot and not seen anymore. as we viewed this my mother inlay pointed out the this object made no noise. i know in my heart that this was not an airplane or any other manmade object. the there where no flashing lights it was a solid bright red beam of light in the front with some yellowish orange around the sides, the way it stopped and changed direction and then disappeared could not have been any plane or other object i have ever seen. i could not sleep last night as i am writing this at 5:30 the next morning.
content.summary: Bright red with some orange yellow

content.detailedDescription:
First let me say that @ 4-5 years ago i reported a similar black mass that was seen on 2 occasions and at the time i did not know what the heck i was seeing, only that i saw the cloudy mass on a similarly clear night while walking my dogs. in my report i said that my dogs were shaking and clearly freaked out by what seemed to be a black cloudy mass that was blocking out the stars.I was also taken back by what i saw because i couldnt tell how high up it was but it was huge and seemed to change shape.

now, for what happened last night. i have video and i have still photos as well.
i was outside getting some fresh air as i often do at night.I am a night owl as it were. when im on the schedule i work the 1900 to 0700 shift outdoors as part of my job and im always looking up, a habit i got into after that experience described above.
last night was a strange night, the moon was very bright and nearly full.
however their were intermittent cloud banks that were occassionally partially blocking the moons light.
okay here is the weird part. when i saw what i am going to describe i had to wake my 25 year old son up to come outside to verify that i wasnt losing my mind. this similar black cloud mass was coming in front of the moon and blocking the light of the moon, but it was making an arc and returning to the same place in front of the moon repeatedly.
i took my cell phone (iphone) and took video of the moon and its strange cloud mass and on camera i noticed a round white circle that would appear and disappear near the moon. it was at a 45 degree angle to the moon and
appeared to the lower left of the moon.
if this does not seem weird yet, read on.....I could record the episode on video and catch the phenomenon on still digital photos but, you could not see the white circle with your eye. what i mean is that my son and i were taking video of the object and could see it clearly on our video screen but if you looked just with your naked eye, their was no white circle at all. i thought at first that maybe its my phone camera malfunctioning, so we used my sons identical (iphone) and got the same results. now even stranger was the fact that over to the west of us was a star or what we assumed was a star that was very bright and when we pointed the camera at it we could not capture a picture or video of it.
it was 50 times brighter than the white circle we were viewing to the east
but we absolutely could not capture it on camera.
the small white circle that was by the moon at times would be completely
covered by the cloudy black mass but we were able to film it as if it were not even covered by this cloud mass that seem to stay for awhile and then appeared to drift to the east only to reappear west of the moon and it would start all over. i watched this for over 2 hours and took several videos of the sighting that could be seen on camera but not by the naked eye. it was and is puzzling to me. it just makes no sense at all.
here we were looking at the monitor with one eye and getting clear video and stills and looking over the camera and seeing nothing at all.
when we decided to call it a night we noticed that the bright star to the west was gone. it should have still been on the horizon but just over a bit like the rest of the stars. your starview changes as the night goes on, thats just the way it is, but it was gone.
the moon was still bright and the white circle was still clear as a bell on video but gone if you looked by eye.
hey guys what the heck is going on here on cape cod. did anyone else see it? i hope so, because it would really mean alot to us if someone else experienced what we did. im happy to share the videos and stills with you but it will only show you the moon and its cloud mass and the little white circle, but i have no way of proving to you that we were not able to see it without the camera.
listen, i wouldnt bother reporting it but i am baffled and a bit frightened by the whole experience.
my son and i have been having the worst unexplained anxiety today.We both woke up very early and sat quietly in the livingroom sipping coffee just looking at each other without talking about it. it is physically impossible to have this happen isnt it? we have been trying to talk about it, but it just makes no sense at all. so after deciding that we were not going to make sense of this episode, i decided to write mufon.
maybe their is a reason and we just dont know enough about it.
thank you for reading this long drawn out mess of a case.
we would very much appreciate any light you could shed on our sighting.
if you can instruct me on how to get the video and stills off my cell phone and to you i will do so, im afraid i dont have alot of experience
with this (iphone) maybe i can email directly off of the phone to an email address of your choosing. call me if you are interested in the footage okay!!!

regards
[names removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Impossible to do  see below

content.detailedDescription: This seems like 25566 from tehachapi, except they reported 9/24, but this was saturday night.  i saw it in the high southwestern sky, probably way out over the pacific.  first there was a fireball and sparks flying off - reminiscent of columbia's re-entry breakup.  there was a bright orange light like a star at the head of the fireball path, heading east.  then the fire trail faded, and the bright orange star changed direction toward the southeast or south, then faded out - perhaps behind clouds.  then it appeared again heading in a southerly direction, then faded out.  there is a tiny blurb in the last paragraph of this crappy story [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/dr] - but it doesn't make sense that this was a launch from vandenberg, because the object and the fire trail was progressing from the western sky toward the east, before it headed south.  unless the launch from vandenberg was an interceptor, and kim jong-il has been trying to nuke us before his party gets tired of his b.S. and kicks him out?  or, it could have been a fusion battleship changing course, similar to the one that strafed the beijing airport.
content.summary: Re-entry, collision, breakup or trajectory fusion burn

content.detailedDescription: Saw what was reported in 25575. noticed a contrail which i thought was strange since it was dark and no moon at the time. very tight contrail also. then noticed a red shape in front of it going from the north to southwest. different shades of red, one very bright. object was very very high up and maintained the contrail. erratic movement while heading south then turned to the east. still moving erratically. lost it in the street light. happy to see that someone else noticed it. it was not a plane.
content.summary: Re: 25575 - red with contrail

content.detailedDescription:
I captured a black dot ufo on video from a video cam attached to a radio controlled airplane. i did not see anything when flying the rc plane. but when reviewing the video i found it twice, approximately in same location in sky as the plane did 2 pass's. 

i was out looking for a downed rc airplane i had lost earlier this week. i attached a video camera to my plane to circle over the area to see if i could find my downed airplane. looks like debris at first until you see the video frame by frame and then see it in same spot as plane circles around for next pass. 

i have tried to debunk it but the video is clear and movement of plane shows the dot is actually in the same area above the rc plane. you just have to see it the video for yourself. i know you will think it is just a flake of dust at first like i did but then see it frame by frame and see that it is by far not dust but an object in the sky. 

like i said i did not see it in sky when flying the plane. i also did not pay much attention to it at first, instead i blew past it thinking it was debris and went looking for my rc plane in the video. i found a couple of white specs (thinking they could be my downed plane) and went back out to the field, turns out the specs were plants and a plastic bag. but when i was out there i noticed a military helicopter flying over. i didn't pay much attention to them. i went back home to do a slower closer look at the footage (still looking for my rc airplane.) and that is when i seen it, i was surprised asked my mther to come see it, she didn't know what to think, i then moved the footage forward to see if the second pass may have found my rc airplane and there it was again.

that is when i knew i caught something significant. i sent a email to you guys and took video camera back out to field. 3rd time out at field i found a couple of teenagers who had been out there during all of this making out in there car (they are in video)i decided not to bother them. i then seen another helicopter, flying really low and slow, i cought it on video!

the pilot looked at me turned and look at passenger and looked back at me the copter almost turned around but instead kept going.

i sent my plane back up, i didn't catch anything in sky this time, but when i landed the plane the kids were leaving. i waved them over and talked to them i told them what i found on the video and asked them if they seen anything they said they didn't, then we herd a boom. it startled us they said what was that i wasnt sure but thought it may have been the plane because i smelled smoke and realized i landed the plane but the motor was trying to spin because i had pushed up the throttle on the radio. i said good bye to the teenagers and went to pick my plane, the esc was burnt up but the video was still rolling. 

i figured i would watch that footage and see what happened when the esc exploded, and that was the funny thing, there was no boom recorded! the video shows the smoking from it overheating and that's it.

i am not transferring this video over the internet.

thanks
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Black dot on video

content.detailedDescription: First saw a nonmoving strip of light in the north sky near an airport, which was probably a contrail illuminated by the setting sun. it began making irregular turns that a meteorite or jet would not make (s-turns followed by long straights, with abrupt reversals.) at this point, the head of the trail wasn't visible. as it drew closer to me, it was obvious that whatever it was was a.)very high up, as no sound could be heard, and b.)moving very quickly. at it's closest point to myself, i observed 4 lights, 3 amber in an equilateral pattern, and a fourth red, blinking light in it's center. i could only see the lights. the middle blinked at about once per second. it then continued on a sweeping turn south, before being lost to sight when all lights abruptly turned off.
content.summary: Triangle with contrail

content.detailedDescription: I'm a commercial pilot based in iah. yesterday (9/25/10)at approximately the same time (1620 hrs)i noticed what appeared to be an egg shaped object over hwy-59 in tomball, tx. it did not appear to me to be a hellicopter. occasionally it would flash a bright red (similar to a flare). i watched the object for almost 10 minutes as it went through some cumulous clouds. as it did, the clouds seemed to 'open up' arround it. i took photos with my cell phone, but after enlarging, i was un-able to see the object. today (9/26/10) at approximately the same time, i was outside and noticed 5, and the 6 egg-shaped whitish/silver objects travelling in a group. again, i took cell phone photos, but they were at such an altitude (at first approx 15,000 ft agl, and then later 30,000-40,000 ft agl) that they again did'nt show up. this time i had a flight attendant that was at my hous at the time, and i asked her to look at it with me- which she did, and verified that these objects were spreading out, then joining back together. as they reached a higher altitude as they floated south, they seemed to line up perfectly from north to south. they either were changing shape from round to oval, or were oval and simply wobbling. i also contacted the mufon tx state director as i watched them, but he was at another area of town, and could not locate them. in my opinion, they appeared to be under intelligent control. i am a military trained aerial observer. the closest possible explination would be weather balloons, but it would not explain their apparent seperation, and then re-organisation flight characteristics. please- if anyone has knowledge of balloon activity north of houston, let me know. if anyone has the ability to enhance these photos- also let me know.
content.summary: Grouping of 6 egg-shaped silvery/white objects travelling in a group from n-s.

content.detailedDescription:
September 25, 2010���9:15 p.M. milton, fla. scattered cloud cover. rained earlier in evening. temperature in 70s.
mt. pleasant baptist church, after an evening of playing music with church member musicians. leaving the church, the object was brought to my attention by a member of the band. 
intense white strip of light below clouds, estimated altitude to be 15,000 feet, appeared to be the length of a commercial aircraft. the elongated bright white light traveled from east to west at the speed of a commercial aircraft. it moved erratically left, right and obliquely forward in estimated two hundred foot jumps.My first thought was, 'this is really weird.' the object reminded me of an insect, but thinking on it later, i believe the (legs)spears of light from the object was just light refraction. 
 observed by four persons and myself, i observed it for about four minutes, then had to leave.
no aircraft in area. object was totally silent.
content.summary: intense bright white light, a perfectly shaped rectangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on a walk with my dog in laguna niguel enjoying the clear night sky, looking at the stars, when a large orange ball of light appeared out of nowhere. it literally just appeared out of the darkness! it was a large orange sphere and changed in size, from large to small, as it flew across the sky. the light appeared to have a very fast pulse rate and was fuzzy around the outer edges when it was in an expanded state. the object appeared to be flying at a constant speed, heading in the direction of dana point. while observing the object, it disappeared for a few seconds, and then reappeared moments later; it continued flying in the direction of dana point. just before it disappeared it became very large and then reduced in size, twice. it went from large, to medium, to small, in that sequence, and then it just disappeared. the whole event lasted about three minutes. i also observed that there were no flashing transponders on the object; as normally seen on aircraft.
content.summary: Bright orange sphere changing in size

content.detailedDescription: As we pull into our home driveway, as i about get out of the car and lookup to the sky and tell my wife that the moon today were so bright and as well as the jupiter. but there is another star also appeared between the distance of moon and jupiter such that its lights so strange and it moves slowly from south to north direction and stops hovering above our home in anaheim - nearby to disneyland. i looked at the watch and it showed 10:54pm. the pulsating lights around its perimeter generated the aurora halo-like with red, amber, blue lights that expended and retracted around its object. around 15 seconds later it started to move back towards its jupiter side and we get lost it. the strange object was not high in the sky when we saw it but it moves higher thereafter. the strange thing is that it made a u-turn in front of our eyes. we hope that many others who live in orange county area could see it and to verify what we saw. total observe time is around 4 minutes. i do have camera with me but there is no good to take its pictures at this nighttime and high up in the sky.
content.summary: A pulsing red, yellow, amber and blue lights around a sphere above anaheim at 9:54pm

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 7:32pm on september 23, 2010, i was traveling northbound on rt. 33 between carrol and canal winchester (one tenth of a mile before the hill/dilely road exit), when i spotted the object. the object caught my eye out of the 10'oclock position (nnw-north northwest). it was in plain sight maneuvering in an unfixed pattern, about 200' off the ground. it appeared to be located about 500' west of the hill/diley rd exit bridge, hovering over an empty field and partially the road.

the object itself was unlike anything i have ever seen. it was sort of egg shaped, without wings or other definition. however the luminosity of the object was the most prominent characteristic. when i first sighted it, the object was an extremely bright (mega-led bright) blue. after a few seconds, it gradually faded into an equally bright red color. it was not the standard blue and red lights of faa regulations common on all commercial/private aircraft. these lights were extremely bright and the source of the colored light encompassed the entire object. 

i estimate the object's size as being relatively small at about less than 4 feet in diameter. it never changed shape, morphed into individual lights nor did it have any dimensional shape. it hovered in a gliding pattern, lowering its altitude, however i never seen it land. i had direct visual contact with object for about 10-12 seconds max. i actually pulled the car onto the highway berm and came to a 5-10mph crawl, in order to soak in what i was seeing. other traffic (10-15 additional vehicles) going in both north and south directions on rt. 33, did not seem to be affected by the object (no one else stopped of slowed down). 

the weather was partly cloudy, dry and the lighting was dusk.

i might also add that 10 minutes prior to the sighting, i noticed an unusual amount of increased outgoing air-traffic originating from rickenbacker air base, located about 6 miles to the west from the sighting location. i saw several (5-7) separate large cargo aircraft depart the air base within a 5 minute span. this occurred 10 minutes or so before i was even in the area of the sighting.

in closing, i have never seen anything unusual in the sky before. i am a fairly avid astronomy buff and am constantly looking into the night sky. this was certainly an event/object i can't seem to get a grasp on. i'm not sure if i really believe that extraterrestrial aliens are visiting the earth. i lean towards "no" due to the immense distances between even the closest stars, however after seeing this object, i am close to at least believing that the object i saw is beyond what mankind can/has produced.

if anyone else seen this object at this time/date, please contact me at: [email address removed/cms/tg].

thanks!
content.summary: Egg shaped, multi-colored object near canal winchester on rt. 33

content.detailedDescription:
I was at  my backyard playing with my bird (cookie), when suddenly i saw a very bright thing on the sky, i can say the it looked like a red man flying.
at the start, i thought it was a balloon or something. but it could move like it was alive ! then i thought "[name removed/cms/tg], we are sooo dead !" but i stayed calm and shout:������������ ������ ������������������ ��������� ������������������ ! ��������� ��������� ��������� ���'��������� ������ ������������ ������ ������������������������ ������������ !!!!!!! ������������, ������������������ ! then, it got away and shout something in a foreign language for me.
content.summary: This was definitely satan !!!
